titleStmt.title: For God's worship and worshipers Both in the purity of the onem and liberty of the other. From the gracious and (oft) miraculous defences that God makes for them both, when exposed to violation or violence. Dedicated to all that desire to worship God, in spirit and truth, John 4. 23, 24.

notesStmt.note: Imprint is false; actual publication date conjectured by Wing.
The words "Purity .. other." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
